InstalledItem.Name: MISC Self Destruct
InstalledItem.Description: MISC Self Destruct

InstalledItem.Name: Chernykh
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

The Chernykh is named after the famed 26th century engineer who designed some of the most prized radars of that era. This medium radar from WillsOp celebrates both the look and performance of those classic components.

InstalledItem.Name: Ginzel
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The unique name for this stalwart industrial power plant was inspired by the nickname of a Juno Starwerk junior engineer who helped design it.

InstalledItem.Name: MISC Starfarer Fuel Intake
InstalledItem.Description: MISC Starfarer Fuel Intake

InstalledItem.Name: ThermalCore
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

When you’re in the middle of an important job, you don’t want to waste time wondering if your cooler is doing its part. Now you don’t have to. With the dependable mid-level ThermalCore cooler from Juno Starwerk onboard, you can take all the guesswork out of heat management.

InstalledItem.Name: ThermalCore

Size: 3

When you’re in the middle of an important job, you don’t want to waste time wondering if your cooler is doing its part. Now you don’t have to. With the dependable mid-level ThermalCore cooler from Juno Starwerk onboard, you can take all the guesswork out of heat management.

InstalledItem.Name: Stronghold
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Stronghold shield generator uses patented hull plating techniques to reinforce the generator’s body to make it one of the sturdiest on the market. That means the shield and component are both built to last.

InstalledItem.Name: Starfarer Ship Armor
InstalledItem.Description: Starfarer Ship Armor

InstalledItem.Name: Kama
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Kama from Juno Starwerk has won more “Fan Favorite” reader’s poll from ‘Long Haul Quarterly’ than any other industrial quantum drive in its class.

InstalledItem.Name: Exodus
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Jump Module
Manufacturer: Tarsus
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Journey across the ‘verse with Tarsus’ Exodus jump module, offering greater reliability to help take your wanderlust to new heights.

Item Type: Fuel Pod
Flow Rate: 1.15 SCU/s
Capacity: 60 SCU

The standard fuel pod of the Starfarer, the CR-60 was designed by MISC to be a well balanced fuel storage option ready to tackle a wide variety of jobs.
